method.name: GET
method.doc:
A GET call to google.Geocode returns a longitude and latitude for a given address.
More at: http://www.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/services.html#Geocoding

param.name: q
param.doc: The address to be located and coverted to a geocode.

param.name: key
param.doc: API key that you establish on the Google Geocode site at http://www.google.com/apis/maps/signup.html.
